description: Mila received death threats and left her school in France after calling Islam "a religion of hate".
title: Mila: Teen who criticised Islam on Instagram moves school
title_page: Mila: Teen who criticised Islam on Instagram moves school - BBC News
maintext: However, Ms Belloubet herself was criticised after arguing that an attack on religion was "an attack on freedom of conscience". French Senator Laurence Rossignol gave Ms Belloubet "0/20 in constitutional law", saying that in France "it is forbidden to insult the followers of a religion but one can insult a religion, its figures, its symbols". Ms Belloubet later said her comments had been "clumsy".
